name: Preely - User Testing
description:
Enhanced usage of forms and form validation in tests based on Figma prototypes.


Thank you for using our plugin ðŸ§¡


Nov 26th, 2021: New ability to export your prototype changes to your tests without breaking your test setup.


Nov 24th, 2021: Fix small bug about transition directions and positioning.


Oct 29th, 2021: Accurately export position of interactions nodes


Oct 6th, 2021: Allow slashes in frame names.


Aug 13th, 2021: Improved exports and interaction handling.


Mar 9th, 2021: Improved handling of components and sub frames.


Feb 9th, 2021: Added notice about exported frames must not share the same name.


Jan 20, 2021: Enabled export of interactions to boost your productivity when setting up a user test!
